data.title: Your Partner Advantage - Become Our Partner
data.meta_description: Get your partner advantage by joining Hitachi Vantara partner program which helps customers with technology that delivers solutions.
data.text:
Partner Program Highlights

Empower your business and drive profitable growth with the Hitachi Vantara Partner Program. Our proven program provides you with a strong foundation for accelerating your business with simplified selling tools, rich incentives, and a reliable portfolio of solutions from edge-to-core-to-cloud.

With our focus on the quality of our partnerships, not the quantity, we ensure that you are positioned for success as you help your customers meet demand and advance seamlessly through their business transformation.

Atos

Advanced Computing transforming your data into business results

Atos has a longstanding partnership with Hitachi Vantara. Hitachi storage solutions play a major part in Atos’ data center and infrastructure solutions and Atos’ advanced computing technology has been integrated into the Hitachi Unified Compute Platform (UCP) offering to ensure that Hitachi is delivering digital transformation solutions of the future. The Hitachi Vantara’s Advanced Server DS7000 Series Scalable servers are based on an innovative architecture developed by Atos to address the needs of Enterprise database and virtualization solutions for critical environments. Atos’ complementary strategies around Edge Computing, IoT, Cloud and Digital Transformation, make us an ideal partner which is continually innovating to provide the best customer experience.

Partnership Video Partnership Video

Brocade

Bringing together two industry titans, this alliance puts a safe pair of hands at the heart of your infrastructure. Designed to help organizations keep on top of complexity, secure services and reduce risk, our easy-to-manage, self-healing SAN and storage solutions come with iron-clad availability guarantees, built-in failovers, problem detection and process automation.

Hitachi and Brocade Solutions Hitachi and Brocade Solutions

CBTS

Transform Business Operations With Cloud-Based Services

A recognized industry leader with in-depth technology skills as well as robust consulting and services practices, CBTS helps customers build and deploy cloud-ready integrated solutions powered by Hitachi. These solutions allow organizations to improve operational efficiency, increase flexibility and business agility, enable innovation, mitigate risk, and reduce capital expenditures with a flexible utility service model. From enablement infrastructure to managed services and support, CBTS is your technology partner to gain a competitive advantage and transform your business operations leveraging cloud-based solutions and services.

CBTS IT SOLUTIONS CBTS IT SOLUTIONS

Cloudera

Cloudera believes that data can make what is impossible today, possible tomorrow. They empower people to transform complex data into clear and actionable insights. Cloudera delivers an enterprise data cloud for any data, anywhere, from the Edge to AI. Powered by the relentless innovation of the opensource community, Cloudera advances digital transformation for the world’s largest enterprises.Cloudera Data Platform is the industry's first enterprise data cloud that delivers multi-function analytics on a unified platform to eliminate silos and speed the discovery of data-driven insights. Together, Cloudera and Hitachi Vantara allow our customers to build a modern Data Warehouse in a hybrid environment and optimize existing EDWs using the Hitachi Vantara portfolio of products and services.

Hitachi and Cloudera Solutions Hitachi and Cloudera Solutions

Commvault

Powerful Protection for Data and Applications

Since 2002, Commvault and Hitachi have partnered to deliver innovative data protection solutions, such as Hitachi Data Protection Suite (HDPS) powered by Commvault, to the market. HDPS can help companies automate data protection and management for unified storage and virtual and cloud infrastructures, consolidate operations, reduce complexity and risk, lower costs and increase efficiency, productivity and agility – all while providing protection for data and applications. In this age of digital transformation, the powerful combination of Commvault and Hitachi allows users to protect and leverage their data to drive maximum value for their business.

Hitachi and Commvault Solutions Hitachi and Commvault Solutions

Coquina Systems

Selected by Hitachi Vantara to provide professional services for the Virtual Storage Platform E Series Midrange Storage solutions for Hitachi Partners. Coquina’s team of certified engineers can design, integrate, and implement services to help Hitachi Partners sell and deliver new storage platforms. Coquina also offers professional services resources for the Hitachi NAS Platform (HNAS) including upgrade services as customer demand grows.

COQUINA SYSTEMS WEBSITE COQUINA SYSTEMS WEBSITE

DXC Technology

DXC Technology (DXC: NYSE) is the world's leading independent, end-to-end IT services company, serving nearly 6,000 private and public-sector clients from a diverse array of industries across 70 countries. The company's technology independence, global talent and extensive partner network deliver transformative digital offerings and solutions that help clients harness the power of innovation to thrive on change. DXC Technology is recognized among the best corporate citizens globally.

DXC Technology Website DXC Technology Website Partnership Video Partnership Video

First Decision Tecnologias inovadoras e informatica LTDA.

Through the Pentaho platform, First Decision Tecnologias delivers integration and automation of data flows between data managers and consumers, improved management of the data pipeline and frictionless access in edge to multi-cloud environment. This helps achieve data management procecess large amounts of data without interruption.

FIRST DECISION TECNOLOGIAS INOVADORAS E INFORMATICA LTDA. WEBSITE FIRST DECISION TECNOLOGIAS INOVADORAS E INFORMATICA LTDA. WEBSITE

Flexential

Flexential solves IT infrastructure challenges for enterprises tasked with meeting the most stringent security, compliance and resiliency demands. We take a consultative approach that recognizes one size does not fit all and that requirements often change over time. Tailored solutions built on our highly connected national colocation platform, spanning 21 markets, and robust portfolio of colocation, cloud, data protection, managed and professional services, flex over time to accommodate evolving hybrid IT requirements.

FLEXENTIAL IT SOLUTIONS FLEXENTIAL IT SOLUTIONS

HCL Technologies

Driving ecosystem-based innovation with alliances

HCL is a leading global IT services company working with clients in the areas that impact and redefine the core of their businesses. Since 1999, HCL has focused on "transformational outsourcing," underlined by innovation and value creation. The company's partnership with Hitachi includes software-led IT solutions, remote infrastructure management, engineering, research and development, and business services. HCL leverages its extensive global offshore infrastructure and network of offices in 31 countries to provide holistic, multiservice delivery in key industry verticals, including financial services, manufacturing, consumer services, public services, healthcare and life sciences.

Partnership Video Partnership Video

Hyosung Information Systems Co., Ltd.

Established in 1985, HIS has grown to serve over 1,700 customers in Korea, ranging in industries from finance, manufacturing, public, and telecommunications, and SI companies. HIS’ success is based on proven and reliable technology and consulting capabilities and a global service network, major infrastructures that make up corporate data centers such as storage and servers, and related solutions such as cloud, big data, and industry 4.0 that lead business innovation.

HYOSUNG INFORMATION SYSTEMS CO., LTD. WEBSITE HYOSUNG INFORMATION SYSTEMS CO., LTD. WEBSITE

Infosys

Accelerating successful deployment of solutions while reducing risk

Infosys (NYSE: INFY) is a global leader in consulting, technology, outsourcing and next-generation services. With US$8.7 billion in annual revenues and 179,000+ employees, the company is helping enterprises to renew themselves while also creating new avenues to generate value. Hitachi Unified Compute Platform is one of the key components of the Infosys private cloud solution in the Microsoft® technology space. Hitachi and Infosys provide solutions and services that are essential to helping global customers transform their data centers.

Hitachi and Infosys Solutions Hitachi and Infosys Solutions

Kyndryl

As a focused, independent company, we're building on our foundation of excellence by creating systems in new ways. Bringing in the right partners, investing in our business, and working side-by-side with our customers to unlock potential. Our global base of customers — including 75 of the Fortune 100 — partner with us for expertise, value creation, speed and agility.

Kyndryl Infrastructure Services Provider Kyndryl Infrastructure Services Provider

Microsoft

Microsoft (Nasdaq “MSFT” @microsoft) enables digital transformation for the era of an intelligent cloud and an intelligent edge. Its mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more.

HITACHI AND MICROSOFT FORM A STRATEGIC ALLIANCE FOR MANUFACTURING AND LOGISTICS HITACHI AND MICROSOFT FORM A STRATEGIC ALLIANCE FOR MANUFACTURING AND LOGISTICS

MongoDB

MongoDB is the leading modern, general purpose database platform, designed to unleash the power of software and data for developers and the applications they build. Headquartered in New York, MongoDB has more than 17,000 customers in over 100 countries. The MongoDB database platform has been downloaded over 90 million times and there have been more than one million MongoDB University registrations.

For many customer use cases, Lumada data integration (Pentaho) simplifies and speeds the process of modernizing to the cloud by moving data from existing RDBMS databases into MongoDB. This support comes in one-time movement of data from RDBMS into MongoDB at scale, as well as continuous data modernization, including change data capture, reconciliation, and validation procedures.

HITACHI AND MONGODB SOLUTIONS HITACHI AND MONGODB SOLUTIONS

Netcompany

We are committed to the health and continuous improvement of the vital systems at the heart of the digital economy. With our partners and thousands of customers, we co-create solutions to help enterprises reach their peak digital performance. Our world has never been more alive with opportunities. Together, we can seize them. We invest in talent and together we deliver at high quality, within scope – every time.

Netcompany IT Consulting Solutions Netcompany IT Consulting Solutions

Oracle

Reduce TCO and accelerate transformation with Oracle and Hitachi

Hitachi, Ltd. is one of only 11 Oracle Global Diamond Partners and has been collaborating with Oracle for more than 20 years. Our alliance integrates two industry-leading portfolios, with Hitachi providing an agile, secure and cost-effective set of solutions to support Oracle’s database and application software. Our solutions are designed to meet the most demanding requirements for performance and resilience to ensure that customers’ most valuable applications and data are always available. From storage, compute and converged infrastructure systems to data protection and automation solutions, and services and support delivered by Oracle experts, our alliance ensures that businesses are ready for what’s next.

Hitachi and Oracle Solutions Hitachi and Oracle Solutions

Otava

We know how to protect it in the cloud. In fact, as one of the first 100% HIPAA compliant service provider in the US, and our defense-in-depth-approach encompasses administrative, physical and technical safeguards to protect your data three ways.

Otava Website Otava Website

PT Berca Hardayaperkasa

Since its establishment in 1990, PT. Berca Hardayaperkasa (BHp) has been one of the leading providers of Enterprise Information & Communication Technology (IT), Communication (Telecommunication Measurement & Infrastructure / TMI & Network Service Provider / NSP) and Test & Measurement (T&M) solutions in Indonesia. BHp is also supported by other principals and has continued to excel in providing efficient ICT solutions, from hardware system to total solutions and services, to over 500 corporations of various industry disciplines nationwide.

PT BERCA HARDAYAPERKASA WEBSITE PT BERCA HARDAYAPERKASA WEBSITE

SAP

Accelerate innovation with integrated Hitachi and SAP solutions

For over 20 years, Hitachi and SAP have helped customers find new ways to achieve their business goals through tailored technology solutions. This strategic alliance takes advantage of our combined leadership and resources in enterprise-class infrastructure, Internet of Things, and cloud solutions. Hitachi and SAP offer integrated and certified solutions that enable simplicity, agility and value across the SAP landscape. Whether striving to create personalized customer experiences, optimize operations or launch innovations, the combined Hitachi and SAP solutions enable smarter decisions at the speed of business.

Hitachi and SAP Solutions Hitachi and SAP Solutions

Sirius

Flexible, integrated solutions tailored to your needs

Sirius Managed Solutions specializes in developing data center environments that optimize application and service delivery, drive operational efficiencies and develop next-generation data center capabilities. Sirius's Backup-as-a-Service (BaaS) solution – powered by Hitachi and Commvault and available on premises, remote, or in data centers – addresses the ongoing challenges associated with backups. It provides the confidence that your data is protected and readily available while minimizing complexity, increasing reliability and reducing the resource requirements traditionally associated with backup and recovery tasks.

Sirius/CDW IT Solutions Integration Sirius/CDW IT Solutions Integration

Snowflake

Snowflake's mission is to enable every organization to be data-driven. Snowflake's cloud-built data platform makes that possible by delivering instant elasticity, secure data sharing and per-second pricing, across multiple clouds. Snowflake combines the power of data warehousing, the flexibility of big data platforms and the elasticity of the cloud at a fraction of the cost of traditional solutions.

Together, Snowflake and Hitachi helps businesses simplify and automate the process of migrating data to Snowflake cloud; Pentaho Data Integration, from Hitachi Lumada portfolio, ensures the right data is ingested at scale, orchestrates SQL in the Snowflake cluster, enables enterprise-wide integration and data blending and to drive deeper insights and greater analytics.

Hitachi and Snowflake Solutions Hitachi and Snowflake Solutions

Sungard AS

Sungard Availability Services (Sungard AS) is a leading provider of cloud connected infrastructure solutions serving enterprise customers through a global network of data centers and workplace recovery facilities. Sungard AS has a 40-year track record of delivering resilient and highly available hybrid IT solutions.

Sungard Availability Solutions Sungard Availability Solutions

T-Systems

Global partnerships, global success

T-Systems is the largest German and one of the largest European IT services companies. Drawing on a global infrastructure of data centers and networks, T-Systems operates information and communication technology (ICT) systems for multinational corporations and public-sector institutions. The company operates in more than 20 countries and employs approximately 47,800 employees worldwide. The Hitachi partnership with T-Systems focuses on ICT outsourcing, private cloud services for enterprise customers, and on-premises solutions based on Hitachi products and services.

T-Systems Cloud Infrastructure Solutions T-Systems Cloud Infrastructure Solutions

Tata Consultancy Services

Working collaboratively for success

Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) is an IT services, consulting and business solutions organization that delivers real results to global business. A part of the Tata group, India's largest industrial conglomerate, TCS has over 324,000 of the world's best-trained consultants in 46 countries. TCS pursues large transformational opportunities employing superior technology from Hitachi, to deploy economically superior storage architecture solutions for storage systems consolidation, migration services and storage reclamation services for its large and enterprise global customers.

Partnership Infographic Partnership Infographic

ThinkOn

Protect data assets and reduce application infrastructure costs

ThinkOn helps companies protect their critical data assets and optimize their application infrastructure costs while avoiding the legal and performance issues associated with using non-Canadian-based cloud companies. ThinkOn Cloud Services, powered by Hitachi, include high-performance data storage designed for large-scale, production-grade applications. With IOPS guarantees and unlimited scale-out capacity, ThinkOn’s high-performance services are the perfect platform to host production-grade, data-centric applications.

ThinkOn Cloud Computing Solutions ThinkOn Cloud Computing Solutions

VMware

Accelerate success with integrated and certified solutions

Hitachi and VMware have been collaborating on technology integration since 2002 to deliver industry-leading solutions. Hitachi is an Elite-level member of VMware's Technology Alliance Partner program and a global OEM, as well as a VMware Consulting and Integration Partner. Hitachi provides a true, deep integrated foundation that spans almost all VMware technologies and environments, from virtualization, converged, storage, networking, adaptors, SDDC and more. Combining the reliability, scalability and innovation of Hitachi with the flexibility and agility of VMware solutions simplifies and automates virtualized environments while reducing cost.

Hitachi and VMware Solutions Hitachi and VMware Solutions

Veritas Technologies

Protect and Harness the Power of Your Data

The exponential growth of data and the resources needed to manage it are among the most pressing issues facing business today. And it's not just the amount of data. It's where data lives and how it travels between private clouds, public clouds and back to on premises. In these increasingly complex IT environments, it's important to focus on what's constant: the data. Veritas information management solutions – from business continuity to backup and recovery to software-defined storage and information governance – are designed around the principle that information is more important than infrastructure. When these solutions are combined with Hitachi Content Platform (HCP), users can collect, protect, analyze and optimize their data, even in the most demanding environments.

Hitachi and Veritas Solutions Hitachi and Veritas Solutions Veritas Website Veritas Website

Wipro

Winning together with alliances

Wipro (NYSE: WIT) is a leading information technology, consulting and business-process services company that delivers solutions to enable its clients to do business better. Wipro delivers winning business outcomes through its deep industry experience and a 360-degree view of "business through technology." Wipro collaborates with Hitachi to create successful and adaptive businesses. A company recognized globally for its comprehensive portfolio of services, a practitioner's approach to delivering innovation, and an organization-wide commitment to sustainability, Wipro has a workforce of over 150,000, serving clients in 175+ cities across 6 continents.

Hitachi Vantara and Wipro - Solutions That Improve IT Cost and Agility Hitachi Vantara and Wipro - Solutions That Improve IT Cost and Agility

Note: Since you opted to receive updates about solutions and news from us, you will receive an email shortly where you need to confirm your data via clicking on the link. Only after positive confirmation you are registered with us.

If you are already subscribed with us you will not receive any email from us where you need to confirm your data.

This site uses cookies from Hitachi and third parties for our own business purposes and to personalize your experience. By using this site, you agree to the use of cookies. For more information, visit Hitachi Cookies Policy.
